p: The high medicinal knowledge of urban phytotherapists can probably be linked to urban phytotherapists who make false claims about their competence, thereby taking advantage of naive patients who are often destitute and in desperate search of medical treatment. These phytotherapists, driven by profit generation, might then prescribe medicinal plant treatments, that do not always correspond to accurate ancestral knowledge. The high medicinal knowledge of curing healers can be associated to the use of medicinal plants for both physical and mental health problems [ 76].
